**Flight Controls**

Lift Engines - 1

Rear Engines - 2

Cargo Ladders - 3

Cockpit Ladders - 4

Cargo Lamp - 5

Landing Lights - 6

Reverse Engines - 7

At lift off use RCS & SAS

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T05:05:28Z" title="08/11/2015 05:05  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by castille7**

Not bad, I like the engine protections, very original, but I couldn't help noticing the center of thrust is slightly off and the center of mass (CoM) moves slightly as fuel is consumed.

For a dropship/vtol you need those 2 things in order to get proper balance (also adjust the center of lift but that's secondary)

There's a mod callled RCS build aid that shows both full and empty center of mass.

Check out this one for an example [https://www./?gxkuam9ly7k466s](https://www./?gxkuam9ly7k466s)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T17:03:30Z" title="08/12/2015 05:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by RevanCorana**

Thank you RevanCorana, I like good criticism. I did notice the craft was off center slightly and would have to design the cargo bay to adjust. Often i tend to post

Crafts too quickly. I will also check out the RCS build aid.
